tail.name: abdomen
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A bump starts to grow above [npc.her] ass which begins to expand aggressively until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.she] suddenly [npc.verb(realise)] that that [npc.she] [npc.has] an opening at the end of the appendage that seemed to be just like an ovipositor. Arousal suddenly hit [npc.her] as the heat started to spread threw [npc.her] abdomen and it starts drooling lubricant, as pressure starts to build in [npc.her] abdomen [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] spherical objects start pushing threw [npc.her] newly formed limb. [npc.she] lets out a moan of pleasure as the pressure becomes too much to bear, then suddenly [npc.she] finds release as dozens of round eggs push threw [npc.her] second sexual orifice. Many minuets and eggs later [npc.she] finally stop as [npc.she] her organs finished transforming.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldHyena(broodmother abdomen)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] bumps starts to grow above [npc.her] ass which begins to expand aggressively until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.she] suddenly [npc.verb(realise)] that that [npc.she] [npc.has] an openings at the end of the appendages that seemed to be just like an ovipositors. Arousal suddenly hit [npc.her] as the heat started to spread threw [npc.her] abdomens and they start drooling lubricant, as pressure starts to build in [npc.her] abdomens [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] spherical objects start pushing threw [npc.her] newly formed limb. [npc.she] lets out a moan of pleasure as the pressure becomes too much to bear, then suddenly [npc.she] finds release as dozens of round eggs push threw [npc.her] new sexual orifices. Many minuets and eggs later [npc.she] finally stop as [npc.she] her organs finished transforming.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldHyena(broodmother abdomens)], [npc.materialDescriptor] #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: protruding out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] broodmother abdomen, which pulsate constantly. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] broodmother abdomens, which pulsate constantly. #ENDIF
